### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE feedback_survey (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  survey_date DATE
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE feedback_survey SET feedback_text = 'Great job!' WHERE survey_id = 1;
